boardgame.name: String Railway
ひも電
boardgame.description: String Railway is a unique train game that consists of colored strings, tokens, station tiles, and a board for scoring. To set up, first place the string tied in a big circle on the table to establish the field area for the game. Next, place a small circle of string to represent mountains and a line of string to represent a river. Finally, place the main stations for each player equal distances apart from one another._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;On a turn, you draw and place a station tile, then try to place a railroad string between your stations in an effort to connect them in order to form your own train network. Connected stations earn victory points (VPs)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;After five turns, the game ends and the player with the most VPs wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Game: Okazu Brand Edition (English/Japanese) Japanese rules only (you should be able to find English and German rules online. The game components are in very good condition, the box is slightly crushed on one side. Please ask for pictures before you make an offer. Payment: I accept bank transfer and, if you pick up the game directly, cash on delivery. No paypal at the moment, sorry. Shipping: I will ship to anywhere in the world. Buyer pays actual shipping costs. International buyers please be aware, that shipping costs to locations outside the EU are quite high. To get a first quote, please look here: http://www.dhl.com I will also ask international buyers to pay for shipping insurance.

FoxMind (FOX310772) Stretch your imagination as you build a twisting, turning railway network. Using colourful strings as your tracks, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll aim to outwit your opponents by strategically placing and connecting your stations with the result of creating the most successful railway network. Exquisite visuals, simple rules and strategic game play make String Railway a delight for famiy nights and avid players alike!

Experienced eBay seller, new to BGG selling. Love games. Payment: Bank Transfer (Ireland, UK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Europe only) - Preferred if possible, buyer pays transfer fees if any. PayPal (Buyer pays fees) Shipping: (Standard or Registered Post) Standard Post (Including 1 Euro packaging materials in price) Ireland - 5.50 UK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Europe - 6.90 USA, Canada, Japan, New Zealand, Australia - 6.90 Registered Post: (Including 1 Euro packaging materials in price) Ireland - 8.60 UK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Europe - 11.90 USA, Canada, Japan, New Zealand, Australia - 11.90 Registered post everywhere else. All my games for sale come from a smoke and pet free environment. Feel free to contact me if you have any questions. Best of luck and enjoy if you buy.
Shipping will be calculated based on where it is to be sent.

Experienced eBay seller, new to BGG selling. Love games. Shipping: (Standard or Registered Post) Standard Post (Including 1.35 Euro packaging materials in price) Ireland - 5.90 UK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Europe - 7.35 USA, Canada, Japan, New Zealand, Australia - 7.35 Registered Post: (Including 1.35 Euro packaging materials in price) Ireland - 9.10 UK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Europe - 12.40 USA, Canada, Japan, New Zealand, Australia - 12.40 Registered post everywhere else. Payment (In order of preference) 1) Bank Transfer - BIC/IBAN (Ireland, UK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Europe only) - Buyer pays transfer fees if any. (Free cross border BIC/IBAN bank transfers within EU countries as far as I know.) 2) PayPal - Select _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Send money to friends and family_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; option to bypass paying fees altogether, no PayPal buyer protection by doing this but you won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t need it. (It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s always free to send money to friends and family when you use your PayPal Balance or Bank Account) If you can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t do this for whatever reason then please add 5 percent of the total cost (Item + P_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;P) to cover fees. Or buyer pays fees as part of the normal PayPal process when paying for merchandise or services if you really want the payment protection. All my games are exactly as described and are usually posted next working day after payment is received. Any other issues will be swiftly resolved in a professional and courteous manner. 3) As a last resort, I also accept Skrill, Payza and Neteller (In that order and buyer pays fees). Combined postage for multiple items where possible. Combined P_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;P can result in higher shipping costs than for a single item due to different postage weight brackets but 9 times out of 10 it should still be less than shipping the items separately. On some occasions, depending on the items, only slightly less. If the combined items weight is less than 2 Kilo, item(s) will most likely be sent in the Packet weight bracket. If items can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t be split into smaller packets then anything over 2 Kilos is a Registered Parcel and the P_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;P costs are considerably higher, usually starting between €40 and €45 and increasing in price as the weight increases for various destinations outside Ireland. PM me for further details if required. All my games for sale come from a smoke and pet free environment. Feel free to contact me if you have any questions. Best of luck and enjoy if you buy.
